title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode should only result in a single redraw of the affected area.
SR:
1. Set StyledText to word wrap mode.
2. Append N lines to the text.
3. Verify that only the affected area is redrawn, instead of the entire client area.
